content: this free infinity scarf pattern is perfect for beginners since it s made up entirely of knits and purls with just these two stitches you can knit up a stretchy texture-rich infinity scarf best of all it s knit up in super bulky weight yarn making it a quick knit this infinity scarf is knit flat seamed together with backstitch and optionally blocked for extra drape this pattern includes a step-by-step tutorial video that walks you through the entire process of knitting the infinity scarf grab the free pattern and tutorial video here 1 1 https //sheepandstitch com/pattern/infinity-scarf-pattern-tutoria/
